sentences.english: The next and largest stage of the plan involves a reconstruction of the Bund roadway.
sentences.chinese: 在下一个和最大的阶段，计划涉及重建外滩巷道。

sentences.english: Companies located in China Yuzhong District Bund mall.
sentences.chinese: 公司位于中国重庆市渝中区外滩商城。

sentences.english: From 1845, the Bund was in the British Concession.
sentences.chinese: 1845年起外滩地带被划为英国租界。

sentences.english: A worker wears a rabbit costume as part of an advertisement at the Bund, one of the most popular tourist destinations in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 在旅游热点上海外滩，工作人员套着兔子服装做宣传。

sentences.english: Is the Shanghai Bund Tourist Tunnel included in?
sentences.chinese: 那有包含上海外滩观光隧道吗？

sentences.english: The Bund lies north of the old, walled city of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 位于北外滩的老，寨城的上海。

sentences.english: The former French Bund, east of the walled city was formerly more a working harbourside.
sentences.chinese: 法国前外滩，东部城寨原更是一个工作海边。

sentences.english: The Bund is the "name card" of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 外滩，是上海的一张城市名片。

sentences.english: Heping Road Tanggu Bund Park Station, located in Shanghai intersection at Street Road and permanently.
sentences.chinese: 塘沽外滩公园和平路站，位于上海道与永久街交口处。

sentences.english: And I like the Bund , too . For in terms of the shape , she is very pretty .
sentences.chinese: 因为从形象学角度看，外滩的确很美。

sentences.english: After skating, they went to pick up their suits from Nan Wai Tan Market.
sentences.chinese: 玩过滑板之后，他们去南外滩市场取了衣服。

sentences.english: I want to go to the Bund to enjoy the morning scenery there.
sentences.chinese: 我想到外滩去欣赏那儿的景色。

sentences.english: You will see people from all over the world touring around the Bund.
sentences.chinese: 您在游览外滩的时候会看到来自世界各地的人们。

sentences.english: Nu Xiao pearl gold trade, the pondering Huangpu Bund waterfront.
sentences.chinese: 怒啸明珠金贸下，沉吟黄浦外滩滨。

sentences.english: Yes, the Bund is a must for tourists at home and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 知道，对于国内外的游客来说，外滩是必游之地。

sentences.english: Visitors can get on the boat at the ferry pier on the Bund on East Jinling Road .
sentences.chinese: 游客可以在船上在码头上对东外滩金陵东路。

definition: Jin Mao Tower, skyscraper in Shanghai
Nanjing St., large commercial street in Shanghai

pinyin: Dong1 fang1 Ming2 zhu1 Dian4 shi4 Ta3

definition: Victoria Harbor, Hong Kong/abbr. for 維多利亞港|维多利亚港[Wei2 duo1 li4 ya4 Gang3]
the main river through Shanghai/name of a district in Shanghai
Wujiaochang neighborhood of Shanghai, adjacent to Fudan University
Xujiahui, an area in 徐匯區|徐汇区[Xu2 hui4 qu1], Xuhui district, central Shanghai
